Kapolri Putuskan Nama Kabareskrim Baru Pekan Depan
02 Nov 2019, 01:23 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Kadiv Humas Polri Irjen M Iqbal. (CNN Indonesia/Adhi Wicaksono)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Kepala Divisi Humas Mabes Polri Irjen Pol Muhammad Iqbal memperkirakan penunjukan kepala Bareskrim baru bakal diputuskan pekan depan. Posisi Kabareskrim sekarang ini kosong karena Jenderal Idham Aziz dilantik menjadi Kapolri RI menggantikan Tito Karnavian."Kabareskrim adalah hak prerogatif Kapolri tentunya lewan Wanjakti, tetapi perkiraan saya penunjukan itu Pekan depan. Setelah acara tradisi welcome farewell parade hari Rabu di Mako Brimob Kelapa Dua," kata Iqbal di Mabes Polri Jakarta, Jumat (31/10).Iqbal mengakui jelang penunjukan ini pasti banyak isu yang beredar mengenai kandidat Kabareskrim. Namun begitu ia tak menyebut spesifik siapa calon yang layak menduduki kursi tersebut."Kandidat banyak, bintang dua semua berpeluang, bintang tiga semua berpeluang. Biasa lah kalau ada begini pasti banyak sekali isu-isu," lanjut dia.Hanya saja menurut dia, Kapolri Idham bakal memprioritaskan untuk memilih perwira tinggi Polri yang jelas integritas dan rekam jejaknya. "Mempunyai track record yang mumpuni, karena Kabareskrim adalah jabatan, salah satu penentu untuk memelihara Kamtibmas di Negara RI," pungkas Iqbal.Salah satu PR yang kelak diemban Kabareskrim baru adalah pengungkapan pelaku penyerangan air keras terhadap penyidik KPK, Novel Baswedan. Kapolri Idham Aziz mengatakan akan segera menunjuk Kabareskrim untuk melanjutkan dan menuntaskan penyidikan yang sudah lebih dua tahun mangkrak.Tim teknis kepolisian untuk kasus Novel diketahui telah melewati tenggat dari target tiga bulan yang dipatok Presiden Joko Widodo. Kasus ini diproses saat Idham masih menjabat Kabareskrim dan Tito Karnavian sebagai Kapolri.(ika/agt)

National Police Chief Decides New Kabareskrim Name Next Week
02 Nov 2019, 01:23 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Head of Public Relations of Polri, Inspector General M Iqbal. (CNN Indonesia / Adhi Wicaksono)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Head of the Public Relations Division of the National Police Headquarters Inspector General of Police Muhammad Iqbal estimates the appointment of a new Criminal Investigation Head will be decided next week. The position of Kabareskrim is currently vacant because General Idham Aziz was appointed as the Indonesian National Police Chief to replace Tito Karnavian. "Kabareskrim is the prerogative of the National Police chief, of course Wanjakti, but my estimation is that next week. After the welcome farewell parade on Wednesday at Mako Brimob Kelapa Dua," said Iqbal at the Jakarta Police Headquarters on Friday (31/10). Iqbal acknowledged that ahead of this appointment there must have been many issues circulating about the Kabareskrim candidate. However, he did not mention the specific candidates who deserve to occupy the seat. "There are many candidates, two stars are all likely, three stars are all opportunities. It is normal if there are so many issues," he continued. Just according to him, the Chief of Police Idham will prioritize choosing high ranking National Police officers with a clear integrity and track record. "Having a track record that is qualified, because Kabareskrim is a position, is one of the determinants for maintaining Kamtibmas in the Republic of Indonesia," concluded Iqbal. One of the homeworks that would later be carried out by the new Kabareskrim is the disclosure of hard water attackers against KPK investigators, Novel Baswedan. National Police Chief Idham Aziz said he would immediately appoint Kabareskrim to continue and complete the investigation that had been stalled for more than two years. The technical police team for the Novel case was known to have passed the deadline of the three-month target set by President Joko Widodo. This case was processed when Idham was still serving Kabareskrim and Tito Karnavian as National Police Chief. (Ika / agt)
